name: Rulebricks
headline: Add powerful decision-making capabilities to any automated workflow.
description:
Many workflow builders and automation tools have support for adding logic to your processes, but get complicated quick– to the point where process owners are unable to edit them directly and require specialist services.

Rulebricks separates decision-making logic from your workflows, giving your team a clear visual, spreadsheet-like interface to manage the changing rules that drive your business, and use those rules as API endpoints, visual forms, and in automation tools like Zapier.
tags: industry:developer-tools; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:workflow-automation; industry:enterprise-software; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Siddharth Garimella, Founder
founders.description: Worked in finance infra for a few years, now on automation.

generated_description:
**Rulebricks**

Founded in 2021 as part of Y Combinator's Batch W21, Rulebricks is a Los Altos, CA-based startup on a mission: to empower businesses with powerful decision-making capabilities easily integrated into any automated workflow. With a lean team of just two, they tackle a common pain point—most workflow builders become convoluted fast, making it tough for non-developers to directly interface with them. Rulebricks sidesteps this challenge.

Their unique approach separates decision-making logic from workflows, allowing business users to operate in a clear, spreadsheet-like interface. This interface enables teams to create, manage, and share rules without needing deep technical expertise. Think of it as a visual rule editor where you can handle everything from routing support tickets to managing inventory, all without writing a line of code.

At its core, Rulebricks offers a robust rule engine that operates in microseconds and integrates seamlessly with platforms like Zapier to automate business processes. The no-code interface isn’t just about simplicity; it also includes advanced features like continuous testing, powerful version control, and real-time data integration, making it easy to adapt to changing business needs.

With over 500 cloud users to date, Rulebricks has established itself as a compelling solution in workflow automation, tagged in categories like developer tools, SaaS, and enterprise software. Their commitment to democratizing decision-making aligns perfectly with the increasing need for businesses to streamline their operations while maintaining transparency and control.

You can explore more about Rulebricks and even get started for free at [rulebricks.com](https://rulebricks.com). It’s straightforward—deploy your first rule in minutes, and give your business the edge it needs in the world of automated decision-making.
